requestBody.title: Customer one signs up and logs in API Trace

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Offline booking holds with conflict warnings". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.
